articles.description: As cases rise and hospitalizations near critical levels, new restrictions are limiting restaurant capacity and mass gathering limits.
articles.content: As cases rise in Buncombe County and hospitalizations near critical levels, new restrictions are limiting restaurant capacity and mass gathering limits as officials make a final plea for residents to… [+8224 chars]
